languages.text: "...вечный, как наша охота во тьме неизбывной". {n}Последние слова Ульфар повторяет со злой и упрямой усмешкой обреченного.{/n} "Да, вечная охота — все, что меня ждет. Спасибо, {name}".

"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."
languages.original_text: "...вечный, как наша охота во тьме неизбывной". {n}Последние слова Ульфар повторяет со злой и упрямой усмешкой обреченного.{/n} "Да, вечная охота — все, что меня ждет. Спасибо, {name}".

in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

languages.text:
“……永恒的狩猎，
在黑暗中永不停息。”
{n}乌尔法重复着你的话语，脸上带着被诅咒之人怨恨而倔强的笑容。{/n}“没错，等待我的只有永恒的狩猎。谢谢你，{name}。”
languages.original_text:
"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text:
“……永恒的狩猎，
在黑暗中永不停息。”
{n}乌尔法重复着你的话语，脸上带着被诅咒之人怨恨而倔强的笑容。{/n}“没错，等待我的只有永恒的狩猎。谢谢你，{name}。”

languages.text:
「…永遠たれ
暗がりで続く我らの狩りがごとく」{n}ウルファーは終わりを迎えようとしている男にしつこく意地悪い笑みを向け、あなたの最後の言葉を繰り返す。{/n}「確かに、永遠の狩りが俺を待つすべてだ。礼を言うぞ、{name}」
languages.original_text:
"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text:
「…永遠たれ
暗がりで続く我らの狩りがごとく」{n}ウルファーは終わりを迎えようとしている男にしつこく意地悪い笑みを向け、あなたの最後の言葉を繰り返す。{/n}「確かに、永遠の狩りが俺を待つすべてだ。礼を言うぞ、{name}」

languages.text:
«... interminable como nuestra caza
en las aciagas tinieblas». {n}Ulfar repite de tus últimas palabras con la mueca maliciosa y obstinada de un condenado.{/n} «En efecto, una caza interminable es justo lo que me espera. Gracias, {name}».
languages.original_text:
"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text:
«... interminable como nuestra caza
en las aciagas tinieblas». {n}Ulfar repite de tus últimas palabras con la mueca maliciosa y obstinada de un condenado.{/n} «En efecto, una caza interminable es justo lo que me espera. Gracias, {name}».

languages.text:
« ... éternel comme notre chasse
dans les ténèbres infinies. » {n}Ulfar répète vos paroles avec le sourire amer d'un condamné.{/n} « C'est en effet une chasse éternelle qui m'attend. Merci, {name}. »
languages.original_text:
"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text:
« ... éternel comme notre chasse
dans les ténèbres infinies. » {n}Ulfar répète vos paroles avec le sourire amer d'un condamné.{/n} « C'est en effet une chasse éternelle qui m'attend. Merci, {name}. »

languages.text:
"... ewig wie unsere Jagd
in unerbittlicher Dunkelheit." {n}Ulfar wiederholt deine letzten Worte mit dem abschätzigen, sturen Grinsen eines Mannes, der zum Untergang verdammt ist.{/n} "Wahrlich, eine ewige Jagd ist alles, was mich erwartet. Danke, {name}."
languages.original_text:
"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."

traits.locale_text:
"... ewig wie unsere Jagd
in unerbittlicher Dunkelheit." {n}Ulfar wiederholt deine letzten Worte mit dem abschätzigen, sturen Grinsen eines Mannes, der zum Untergang verdammt ist.{/n} "Wahrlich, eine ewige Jagd ist alles, was mich erwartet. Danke, {name}."

languages.text:
"Amansız karanlıktaki
avımız kadar sonsuz." {n}Ulfar, son sözlerini lanetli bir adamın kindar ve inatçı gülümsemesiyle tekrar ediyor.{/n} "Haklısın, beni bekleyen sonsuz bir av var. Teşekkür ederim {name}."
languages.original_text:
"...eternal as our hunt
in darkness unrelenting." {n}Ulfar echoes your last words with the spiteful, stubborn grin of a doomed man.{/n} "Indeed, an eternal hunt is all that awaits me. Thank you, {name}."
